GSP33nabodhsu:3007: sevako bodhasāro me mama sevāṃ karoti yaḥ // NBs_52.2 //
GSP33nabodhsu:3009: sakhā me bodhasāro'yaṃ yasmindṛṣṭe sukhaṃ mama // NBs_52.3 //
GSP33nabodhsu:3011: ārāmo bodhasāro me vihāro yatra māmakaḥ // NBs_52.4 //
GSP33nabodhsu:3013: mano me bodhasāro'yaṃ mananaṃ yena jāyate // NBs_52.5 //
GSP33nabodhsu:3015: cittaṃ me bodhasāro'yaṃ yena cetāmi tatpade // NBs_52.6 //
GSP33nabodhsu:3017: śarīraṃ bodhasāro me mamatā yatra bhūyasī // NBs_52.7 //
GSP33nabodhsu:3018: prāṇo me bodhasāro'yaṃ mamatā yatra bhūyasī /
GSP33nabodhsu:3019: jīvo me bodhasāro'yaṃ yena jīvāmyahaṃ sadā // NBs_52.8 //
GSP33nabodhsu:3020: īśvaro bodhasāro me yato muktiprado mama /
GSP33nabodhsu:3021: bodhasāraḥ paraṃ brahma bodhasārātparaṃ nahi // NBs_52.9 //
GSP33nabodhsu:3023: prāmāṇyasiddhaye upaniṣadi vane ye puṣpitā mantravṛkṣāḥ surabhikusumameṣāmekamekaṃ vivicya samarasapadalabdhyai vāṅmayairevapuṣpairnaraharisudhiyaitatpūjitaṃ bodhaliṅgam // 1 //
GSP33nabodhsu:3025: naraharivihito'yaṃ bodhavṛkṣasya toyaṃ kumativanakuṭhāraḥ paṭhyatāṃ bodhasāraḥ // 2 //
